titles.title: To provide for the conversion of a temporary judgeship for the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E383-384)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 3/1/2011--Introduced. Converts a temporary judgeship for the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship.
